entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @realDonaldTrump @WhiteHouse Listening to your Coronavirus Task Force.. it sounds like you are playing GOD. Sorry sir, you can’t fix this yourself. You should have relied upon Doctors and Scientist rather than your “hunches” and “feelings”. You are #Desperate and it doesn’t look good. #Unfit #Unprepared https://t.co/0thOnCoq2T
